= Event model =

Events are used for inter-portlet communication between portlets.


== Event ==

The event has the following attributes:
  # *portletTagId* - id of portlet element,
  # *portletUId* - identifier of the portlet, 
  # *name* - event name,
  # *value* (Json String or Object, can be converted from one type to another by kernel of Ajax Portal) - transfer data, 
  # *receiver* (portletTagId or portletUId or null) - point to point or for all.
  # *expiredTime* - after this date/time the event is not valid and cannon be observed and will be deleted by garbage collector of the portal.
  # *deleted* - the marker. If the marker value is *true* the event is not valid and should be deleted by garbage collector of the portal.

== Event Queue ==

All events are put in the *Event Queue* of the portal. All portlets can be read thess events wthout any restriction.
